info.title: Official Akeneo PIM API
info.description:
The Akeneo API brought to you!

Find out how this Postman collection works by visiting http://api.akeneo.com

get.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing asset
Assets (2.1 only).

post.description: Assuming that there is no "new_asset" already existing

get.description: Assuming that the given codes are respectively the code of an existing asset and an activated locale if the asset is localizable (it should be equal to "no-locale" otherwise)

post.description: Assuming that the given codes are respectively the code of an existing asset and an activated locale if the asset is localizable (it should be equal to "no-locale" otherwise)

get.description: Assuming that the given codes are respectively the code of an existing asset and an activated locale if the asset is localizable (it should be equal to "no-locale" otherwise)
Assuming that the given codes are respectively the code of an existing asset, an existing channel and an activated locale if the asset is localizable (it should be equal to "no-locale" otherwise)

post.description: Assuming that the given codes are respectively the code of an existing asset, an existing channel and an activated locale if the asset is localizable (it should be equal to "no-locale" otherwise)

get.description: Assuming that the given codes are respectively the code of an existing asset, an existing channel and an activated locale if the asset is localizable (it should be equal to "no-locale" otherwise)
Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing asset category
Asset categories (2.1 only).

post.description: Assuming that there is no "new_asset_category" already existing

get.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing asset tag
Asset tags (2.1 only).
Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing association type
Association types (2.x only).

post.description: Assuming that there is no "new_association_type" already existing

get.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing attribute
Attributes.

post.description: Assuming that there is no "new_attribute" already existing

get.description: Assuming that the given codes are respectively the code of an existing attribute and an existing option of this attribute

patch.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing attribute

get.description: Attribute options.

post.description: Assuming that there is no "yellow" option already existing for the given attribute

patch.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing attribute

get.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing attribute group
Attribute groups (2.x only).

post.description: Assuming that there is no "new_attribute_group" already existing

get.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing category
Categories.

post.description: Assuming that there is no "new_category" already existing

get.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing channel
Channels.

post.description: Assuming that there is no "new_channel" already existing

get.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing currency
Currencies (2.x only).
Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing family
Families.

post.description: Assuming that there is no "new_family" already existing

get.description: Assuming that the given codes are respectively the code of an existing family and an existing family variant

patch.description: Assuming that the given codes are respectively the code of an existing family and an existing family variant

get.description: Family variants (2.x only).

post.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing family

patch.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing family

get.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing locale
Locales.
Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing measure family
Measure families (2.x only).
Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing media file
Medias.

post.description: Assuming that the given identifier is the identifier of an existing product and that the given attribute code exists

get.description: Assuming that the given identifier is the identifier of an existing product
Products.

post.description: Assuming that there is no "new_product" already existing

delete.description: Assuming that the given identifier is the identifier of an existing product

get.description:
Assuming that there is already a draft for the given product. The draft was created by the same user that using this request.
The user has only an edition permission through categories on the given product.

post.description:
Assuming that there is already a draft for the given product. The draft was created by the same user using this request.
The user has only an edition permission through categories on the given product.

get.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing product model

patch.description: Assuming that the given code is the code of an existing product model

get.description: Product models (2.x only).

Assuming that there is already a draft for the given product model. The draft was created by the same user that is using this request.
The user has only an edition permission through categories on the given product model.

post.description:
Assuming that there is already a draft for the given product model. The draft was created by the same user using this request.
The user has only an edition permission through categories on the given product model.

get.description: Assuming that the given identifier is the identifier of an existing product that is currently published
Published products (2.x and ee only).
